title: LeaverBuster Penalty after everygame.
body: So I played a custom game with myself to check out a skin, then left it. Which got me a 5minute leaver penalty when I queued for an actual game. I thought was weird but maybe leaverbuster thought i was in an actual game. I am now getting a leaver penalty after every game I play, even though I am definitley not leaving.

replies.body:
lol they have it enabled for custom games?

That's just laughable.
